desc: Beard care products beard oil beard balm

layout.text:
Nothing is more American than baseball.
Since the scandal of the fixing of the 1919 World Series, baseball has always been connected (pun intended) to the Mafia. There are many parallels between baseball and the Mafia. Whether it is the Family (team), the Boss (Captain), or the terms Hit and Whack that are self-explanatory. You'll notice many of these terms in the varieties of our products.
Historically, baseball players have set many facial hair trends. From mutton chops and goatees to full grown beards. The 6-4-3 Mafia created a variety of premium beard care products to ensure that you will have that elite, well-groomed beard on and off the field.
